response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["age", "medium", "Being 21 puts her in a higher-risk age group, though female gender partially mitigates this"],
    ["criminal history", "low", "Only 1 prior arrest indicates limited criminal involvement"],
    ["marital status", "low", "Being married and living with spouse typically provides stability"],
    ["education/employment", "medium", "Has HS diploma but only 1 job in past year suggests employment instability"],
    ["drug use", "medium", "Past marijuana use indicates substance abuse issues, though not harder drugs"],
    ["mental health", "high", "Persistent depressive symptoms are strongly correlated with recidivism"],
    ["family background", "low", "Grew up with biological mother, stable household size"],
    ["social support", "low", "Religious beliefs and marriage suggest positive support systems"]
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: Being 21 puts her in a higher-risk age group, though female gender partially mitigates this
Only 1 prior arrest indicates limited criminal involvement
Being married and living with spouse typically provides stability
Has HS diploma but only 1 job in past year suggests employment instability
Past marijuana use indicates substance abuse issues, though not harder drugs
Persistent depressive symptoms are strongly correlated with recidivism
Grew up with biological mother, stable household size
Religious beliefs and marriage suggest positive support systems

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old female who identifies herself as White. She has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. She is 5 feet 4 inches and weighs 130 lbs. She is married and is currently living with her spouse. She has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. She has held 1 job during the year. She has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and all of the time during the past month she has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer her up. At a young age, she lived with her biological mother in a household of size 5. She considers that God has something to do with what happens to her personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
